extends java.lang.Object

        Initializes the registry of sprites for games.

        Returns the unique instance of this class.

      • registerSprite

        public int registerSprite(java.lang.String key)
        Register a new sprite string.
        Parameters:
        key - key in the hashmap.
        Returns:
        Returns its new index, or a new one if it was already registered.

      • getRegisteredSpriteValue

        public int getRegisteredSpriteValue(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the index (value in map) of a given key, for sprites.
        Parameters:
        key - key to check
        Returns:
        the value in map, -1 if it does not exist.

      • getRegisteredSpriteKey

        public java.lang.String getRegisteredSpriteKey(int value)
        Returns the String associated with the first (and in theory, unique) sprite value passed. This method is for debug purposes only, should not be used for game execution.
        Parameters:
        value - value whose key is returned.
        Returns:
        the String associated with the value passed.

      • numSpriteTypes

        public int numSpriteTypes()
        Returns the -number of elements in the sprite_mapping array.
        Returns:
        number of elements in the sprite_mapping array.
